item.title: Why I created 30min.io
item.description: Few notes about this articles: - Why did I create it this project? - Discussion with a friend - 60days challenge, did we manage it? - mention bootstrapping 30min.io in 30min sessions, at least 30minutes.io - hourglass! => I need a picture of that !!! - logo design … how it started - how is it going till now - Do you think I should allow an option where I 0
